Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.summary: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).

remarks.format:
## Remarks 必须知道的多播的组地址和发件人源地址。
除了从特定的发件人，接收多播的数据<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>客户端还可以返回到发件人发送单播数据。
若要从多个源接收多播或源不事先已知的当使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>类。

MemberSignature.Value: public UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient (System.Net.IPAddress sourceAddress, System.Net.IPAddress groupAddress, int localPort);

Docs.param: The sender source address for this receiver to subscribe to.
The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.
The local port for this receiver to bind to.
Docs.summary: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>构造函数将 UDP 多播套接字的组地址和端口，与相关联，但不会绑定或以其他方式使用套接字。
`groupAddress`参数可能是 IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。 但是的地址族`sourceAddress`和`groupAddress`参数必须相同。
`localPort`参数必须指定一个端口小于 1024。

Docs.exception: and must be the same address family.
is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). -or- is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
is less than 0 -or- is greater than 65,535.
is less than 1024

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.param: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
Optional state information to pass to the callback method for this operation.
Docs.summary: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
Docs.returns: Returns . An that references this operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A>方法将 UDP 多播套接字绑定到的本地端口和联接多播的组以允许从单个源地址收到的数据报。 中指定的多播的组地址、 单个源地址和要绑定到的本地端口<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。
中指定的方法`callback`要加入多播的组的操作已完成时调用参数。
如果所需的运行时，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginJoinGroup%2A>方法还会执行策略检查以验证客户端是否允许访问多播的组。 如果客户端不允许访问，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。

Docs.exception: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

Docs.param: The buffer to store the received data.
The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the buffer where the data should be stored.
The maximum number of bytes to receive and store in the buffer.
The callback method to invoke when the operation completes.
Optional state information to pass to the callback method for this operation.
Docs.summary: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from a specified sender.
Docs.returns: Returns . An that references this operation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>方法开始从来自单个发件人已联接的多播组接收 UDP 数据包的操作。 中指定的本地端口、 多播的组和发件人源地址<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。 多播客户端必须具有已完成加入多播组。
中指定的方法`callback`收到数据包时，将调用参数。
它可具有套接字失败，如果接收操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。 如果发生套接字失败，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

Docs.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
is less than 0 -or- is greater than the length of the . -or- is less than 0 -or- plus the count is greater than the length of the .
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket for receiving.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>方法开始将 UDP 数据包发送到以前指定的源的操作。
某些协议使用此信息来传递流控制，质量的服务统计信息或恢复消息。
中指定的方法`callback`发送数据包时，将调用参数。
客户端必须已完成加入多播组。
如果在指定目标端口`remotePort`参数为小于 1024，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。
它可具有套接字失败，如果发送操作失败同步，虽然这是使用 UDP 不常见。 如果发生套接字失败，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

is less than 0 -or- is greater than the length of the . -or- is less than 0 -or- plus the count is greater than the length of the . -or- is less than 0 or greater than 65,535.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.summary: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在完成使用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>。 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> 处于不可用状态。 在调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>占用。
每次释放对 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>。 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient> 对象的 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

Docs.param: The result of the asynchronous join operation.
Docs.summary: Completes the asynchronous join group operation to a multicast group.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A>方法完成异步绑定到套接字和联接的多播组的操作。
如果所需的运行时，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndJoinGroup%2A>方法还会执行策略检查以验证客户端是否允许访问多播的组。 如果客户端不允许访问，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发与<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError.AccessDenied>。
如果执行联接组操作，时套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

Docs.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A>方法完成一个异步操作以从单个源中的多播组接收数据包。
如果在执行接收操作时出现套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

Docs.exception: is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

如果在执行接收操作时出现套接字失败<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>引发。 收到的错误指定的成员为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketError>枚举。

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Docs.value: 返回 。 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

remarks.format:
## Remarks `ReceiveBufferSize`属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位的接收缓冲区的基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用于对此的多播的接收操作<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>实例。 具体而言，`ReceiveBufferSize`属性控制当数据包到达，但尚未调用应用程序时，堆栈所使用的缓冲区的大小<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>方法。 如果此缓冲区被填满和应用程序调用之前不断涌现数据包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.EndReceiveFromSource%2A>方法，旧的数据包将被丢弃。 应用程序永远无法接收旧的数据包，并在它调用时将收到较新的数据包<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginReceiveFromSource%2A>方法。
在 Windows 上的接收缓冲区的默认大小为 8192。

Docs.exception: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public int SendBufferSize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 SendBufferSize
Public Property SendBufferSize As Integer
public: property int SendBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Never)
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.
Docs.value: 返回 。 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

remarks.format:
## Remarks SendBufferSize 属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位的发送缓冲区的基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用于对此的多播的发送操作<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient>实例。
在 Mac OS X<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>属性控制字节数可能处于网络堆栈发送等待缓冲区之前对其他调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>方法启动失败。 Mac OS X 上的应用程序可能需要加以注意此属性，如果它们在短时间范围内发送大量的 UDP 数据包。
在 Windows 上，调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.BeginSendToSource%2A>方法将采用更长时间才能调用根据的值的回调<xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>属性，如果发送缓冲区已满。 <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpSingleSourceMulticastClient.SendBufferSize%2A>属性仅控制是否用户的缓冲区保持在物理内存中锁定，直到发送完成。
在 Windows 上的发送缓冲区的默认大小为 8192。

Docs.exception: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
